newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Welback says chairman in stake sale talks.
newsitem.headline: Welback says chairman in stake sale talks.

text.p: Welback Holdings Ltd said on Wednesday its chairman Lee Chun Kwok and managing director Fong Wing Seng had been approached by an independent third party in relation to a possible acquistion of their stake in the company.
"Negotiations as regards such sale of shares in the company are still in a preliminary stage and such sale and purchase may or may not materialize," the company said in a statement.
Lee and Fong, the controlling shareholders of the company, hold an aggregate 140.84 million company shares.
Shares of the video game maker rose HK$0.255 or 53.68 percent to HK$0.73 in early trade.
